alert.note: Alert for Broward; Collier; Glades; Hendry; Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 16 at 10:58AM EST until January 16 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Collier County in southwestern Florida... Hendry County in southern Florida... Northern Broward County in southeastern Florida... Western Palm Beach County in southeastern Florida... South central Glades County in southern Florida... * Until noon EST. * At 1058 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Montura to 7 miles southeast of Ave Maria, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, Clewiston, Pahokee, South Bay and Moore Haven. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EST for southern, southeastern and southwestern Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EST for southern, southeastern and southwestern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Broward; Collier; Glades; Hendry; Palm Beach
